comment._content:
UK Soldiers Died in the Great War database shows Mark Greenhough's regimental number as 5894.

At the time of the 1911 census return he was living in North Bierley at 32 Mount Royal with his parents Harry and Elizabeth. He was then aged 14 and was working as a Spinner. Birth index records show that his birth was registered in the third quarter of 1896.
